response.original_title: NFT:WTF? | The Rise and Fall of NFTs
response.overview: NFT:WTF? is a feature-length documentary that examines the disruptive force of Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs) in the contemporary art scene. The ground-breaking documentary marks one of the first comprehensive explorations of the history of NFTs and provides unparalleled insight into the turbulent NFT market through the eyes of some of its key players.  With unprecedented access to leading artists in the NFT zeitgeist, including Damien Hirst and Beeple, as well as interviews with founders of Art Blocks and The Bored Ape Yacht Club, celebrity collectors, and early adopters like Snoop Dogg. The film explores profound questions about the nature of art, ownership, and community in the digital age.
response.title: NFT:WTF? | The Rise and Fall of NFTs

titles.title: NFT: WTF/The Rise of Fall of NFT
